subject: I need support
description_text:
I have an unpaid commission for this month, and I hope you can consider it
as soon as possible, as promised.

conversations.body_text: Hi Anh Ngo,  Rest assured, we will pay the full commission. Typically, commissions for December are settled in February of the following year, with a one-month interval, as refunds may affect the final amount.

My commission was created in November


Vào CN, 28 thg 12, 2025 lúc 11:17 service@simsonn.com
